website_summaries.verdict: A top-class table that gets high praise for its looks and sturdiness.
pros: Set includes a table and two benches that look good outdoors or indoors
Acacia wood and iron frame assembly
cons: The sun and other outdoor elements can do a job on the finish, so apply a coat of polyurethane or other weather treatment before putting it outside
Some units arrived with some damage
Benches are too wide to fit under the table

customer_reviews.title: Would NOT recommend this item for outdoor use.
customer_reviews.text: This table has a nice design, but if you are planning to use it outdoors, be cautious. I waited a year to review this product because I wanted to see how it withstood being in the sun. Turns out, not very well. Picture included. The wood is pealing and warping. I applied a weather varnish before using it outdoors. I gave this item two stars because I think it would make a great indoor table. Would not recommend this item for outdoor use.
customer_reviews.author: Captain

customer_reviews.title: Too bad! I was excited when this arrived -- very ...
customer_reviews.text: Too bad! I was excited when this arrived -- very attractive. But it didn't even last one year before it started to crack and warp. And we don't even live where there is a severe winter. I doubt we will get more than another year of use out of it, even after we refinish it.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Baker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent table at affordable price
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this table! The assembly is very simple and the quality is EXTREMELY good considering the relatively affordable price. We use it all the time and have it placed in a shaded area in the backyard so there's not so much sun exposure. It's only been about 1/2 a year but it still looks great and cleans up very easily from the hose cleaning it gets regularly due to "forces of nature" at work in the backyard. People ask us all the time where we got it. Would recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: JMN27302

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful table set
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful table..I chose the indoor table set for our dining room. Easy to assemble. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: benches would fit under for easy storage. otherwise table is great
customer_reviews.text: only design issue, if table frame was 2" longer, benches would fit under for easy storage. otherwise table is great.
customer_reviews.author: The Duck1985

customer_reviews.title: This is my second, and I may buy a third later on this year.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second, and, depending on how the budget goes across other household expenditure, I may get a third. My loving the design and price gets it four stars. Ease of assembly takes this up to five. I am a real klutz and with this product (i) the instructions are idiot-proof and (ii) what they instruct one to do is simple and straightforward. The manufacturers include spares for the hardware, which speaks well of their customer focus. There is a helpline, and the fact that I had no need to call it is testimony to the ease of assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Delta D.

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice Picnic Table
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This table was a lot nicer than I expected. Normally I would not buy something like this without seeing it myself. For an item like this, even with good reviews, it can be hard to know exactly what you are getting, especially if you're like me and have high expectations. But this table is great. It is a full sized picnic table and it looks exactly like the picture on the Amazon site. The aesthetics are great. It looks and is very sturdy and solid, yet it is not overly heavy to move around. I would say this is one of my best Amazon purchases ever.
customer_reviews.author: A. Halverson

customer_reviews.title: We scoured the internet to find a good looking picnic table with detached benches and are so ...
customer_reviews.text: We scoured the internet to find a good looking picnic table with detached benches and are so happy we made the choice to purchase this table. The quality is great (we did purchase a cover, to help during the rainy season), the size is perfect and we have had many wonderful nights hosting friends and family. We have the table outside, and it is a lovey addition to our yard.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle MM

customer_reviews.title: Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: We are 2 for 2 on these tables. Received the first order without benches. After in packing we noticed the table had a broken off piece of wood on the surface as a result of overtightening of screws on the bottom. ( at the factory). Waited for the replacement table which had even worse damage. Kept one bc of the hassle of resending. After a year, everything is breaking down. The benches have broken and the table is not far behind. Save your money - this is the lowest tier of fabrication.
customer_reviews.author: Kai C. Pradel

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and durable table. Was pleasantly surprised after taking a gamble to make a large purchase over the internet without seeing it.
customer_reviews.author: Steffen

customer_reviews.title: Love it on the back patio
customer_reviews.text: Love it on the back patio. We water-sealed the table and benches (looks great) and expect it to last far longer than I will. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kris k.

customer_reviews.title: We have gotten tons of compliments on this table. ...
customer_reviews.text: We have gotten tons of compliments on this table. We actually purchased 2 and use them to create one long table on our porch. We bought the covers to help keep them protected from the elements. They look fabulous. We have not had them long so I cannot speak to it’s durability.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: My husband said the directions were the best he’d ever seen
customer_reviews.text: Table came undamaged and is very study. Goes together quickly. My husband said the directions were the best he’d ever seen. The wood is a lovely color. This will be in a 3 season room so it will not be exposed to the elements.
customer_reviews.author: PCRC

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, Solid Build.
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat it for the price - and I make furniture. I purchased this set for the legs, planning to scrap the wood for a table top of my own design - but the wood is decent and appears well made, so I'll save that project for another day and enjoy the table.
customer_reviews.author: John W Ayers

customer_reviews.title: Missing Benches :/
customer_reviews.text: Only received the table without the benches. Waiting for a response from Amazon/Great Deal Furniture about the issue. Hoping it's just a FedEx error.
customer_reviews.author: Kimchi

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged - Screws not long enough to keep legs attached
customer_reviews.text: Legs were not attached when it arrived. My husband re-drilled holes and added larger screws to reassemble legs and it is now quite strong. This is a beautiful table but it is not constructed well. I would not recommend purchase unless you have a handy man handy.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: No no no - don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I unboxed and assembled the benches first. Love them - attractive, sturdy, easy to assemble. Then I opened the box containing the table - wow. It’s already falling apart and I haven’t even unboxed it. The wood on the tabletop is split and delaminating. This table was so expensive - and I’ve been totally ripped off. Don’t let this happen to you. Shop elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Kirin

customer_reviews.title: Really like it! I red about color fading
customer_reviews.text: Really like it! I red about color fading, so, I applied a heavy coat of polyurethane and after one year under the California sun is still in tip top condition. -1 star for a minor issue with the hardware: one of the benches legs hinge was detached.
customer_reviews.author: Gianluca Viale

customer_reviews.title: Great table for our family of 5.
customer_reviews.text: We've had this picnic table set for a couple of years now and it has weathered well. (We bought the recommended cover with the purchase) When not in use we make sure its covered from the sun (when it comes out here in Seattle) and during the fall and winter months. I added a small blue tarp under the cover in the winter months for extra protection.
customer_reviews.author: MW Carp

customer_reviews.title: Benches?
customer_reviews.text: I only received the table. Are the benches arriving in a separate package? Table is stunning. I really want to have the matching benches I paid for. Any advice is greatly appreciated!
customer_reviews.author: Star Owens

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and seemed well made
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty and seemed well made, however after a week outside the wood raised and warped on the end of the table. Disappointed that this happened so quickly. Not expecting it to last long at all. Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla F

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and easy to put together. The only advice I would share is it has you put the bottom horizontal brace on first. It is easier to assemble if you secure the vertical legs first. I also got the cover. My family and I enjoy using the table to eat out on our patio.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia M. Crabtree

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and so easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I am totally amazed by this product. The quality is just fantastic and the wood benches and top are truly beautiful. I was a little worried about assembly but it was super easy and done in about 40 minutes by myself. I cannot say enough about this fine table. Totally happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Jack Hemby

customer_reviews.title: Warping and Cracking
customer_reviews.text: The first table, after taking several weeks to arrive, was broken. They graciously sent another, which took another few weeks to arrive, but then I had to deliver a HUGE and heavy box to the UPS store. The second table arrived in tact and it’s beautiful. However, after only a few months the wood is splitting and warping and discoloring. It started after only a week or so outside. I’m disappointed. I thought at this price point I’d get better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Rulo

customer_reviews.title: Simply great!
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality and acacia wood combined with steel frame. Holds up to Florida weather
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Worn out in 2.5 year when outside
customer_reviews.text: Looked very pretty in the beginning. We got it 2 1/2 year now, and had it outside. The info said that's ok, expect the color to change. Nowadays it's really sagging and looks very worn-out, like 10 years old table. Clearly to thin wood and construction wise not ok. Frame is still really good, so I will have to get some new wood and create new table top. Wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Bart Lemmen

customer_reviews.title: Great patio set
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed, packed expertly, easy to assemble and VERY solid. This is a great patio set.
customer_reviews.author: Michael V

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional purchase
customer_reviews.text: So lucky to have found this table! It's beautiful and is perfect for my patio. Will weatherize with a sealer and cover so it will last forever!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor value set
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, took about an hour to assemble and had great instructions. Happy with this and heads up that it will not remain this color.
customer_reviews.author: beleni

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and practical.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best buys we have made. Easy to assemble and very sturdy and good looking. A comfortable set that you can't go wrong buying.
customer_reviews.author: J.P. Marcus

customer_reviews.title: A very nice table
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality table. Unfortunately mine had a split in one of the boards. I repaired it instead of returning, because the table is very heavy and it would have been too much trouble
customer_reviews.author: tloch

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy picnic table
customer_reviews.text: Great, sturdy picnic table. The table is large enough to accommodate 3 people on each bench. I love the design and look of the table, super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Carissa Ahyo

customer_reviews.title: Love This Beautiful Table
customer_reviews.text: Oh sweet Jesus this table is awesome So beautiful Light and easy to move Water does not hurt it LOVE
customer_reviews.author: M. cuneo

customer_reviews.title: Good overall
customer_reviews.text: Good overall, but required A coat or two of sealant. This is made of segments of wood dovetailed together, but there are areas where it is filled with glue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, but terrible construction
customer_reviews.text: The table looks great. Bought a cover so the color doesn't fade. Have only used the table three times. But now the screws have ripped from the center beam. Very poor construction. Will have to somehow add a center beam so the table doesn't fall apart. If you want a table that looks great but can't be used for you know a table... this is the one!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M. Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely in love with this product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely in love with this product. I love rustick looking furniture and this was just a perfect addition to my home. Well priced and an incredible quality
customer_reviews.author: Januszilla

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble. Great solid wood. Color was nice. Comfortably sits 3 on each bench. High quality.
customer_reviews.author: Catts Family

customer_reviews.title: Great table...if only all the pieces were properly aligned, so I could actually use it.
customer_reviews.text: Table itself is beautiful, but very upset with assembly...holes for the bolts on bottom that are needed to bolster table were installed slightly misaligned by manufacturer, there's no way for me and my mother to re drill holes to make it fit without help. Company does not answer customer service phone calls, emails to company have been sent, no answer yet. Will edit review if I hear back from them. For $400 I expect better manufacturing than this.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Best outdoor bench
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best outdoor bench ever. Durable, strong, beautiful in color. We love it. It weathers so well.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Thomas Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Arrived dented, but still nice
customer_reviews.text: A good looking table. Fairly solid and heavy. Unfortunately two of the metal components arrived dented - and sending it back isn't worth the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin B.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful. Assembly took 2 of us about an hour
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Assembly took 2 of us about an hour. Very sturdy. Using it outdoors so plan on putting a coat of polyuerithane on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid and beautiful enough for the dining room.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! My wife loved it so much that it will never see the outside. It's now our dining room table! Easy to assemble. Tough and sturdy. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael F. Winskie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful table, and easy to put together. We were very pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: From a healthcare professional

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This is a great table and benches for the price. Looked st many of these and this is the best price for the quality. Great workmanship and love the fact the legs fold up for storage in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: jr1959

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete shipment hassle
customer_reviews.text: Only received the benches and have no option to receive the exact table I want without having to disassemble the benches. Update: The table is excellent. I kept the extra benches that came without the table and ordered a second set. It’s wonderful quality, careful with acids on the wood! I keep the extra benches outside and they have held up to almost a full year of Florida weather!
customer_reviews.author: Pauliusl

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Nice table as advertised. 5 minutes to put together. Will update review in 6 months. But so far good purchases
customer_reviews.author: horace m.

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm always leery about buying things without seeing them I am so glad I purchase this picnic table and bench set !! It is very sturdy it is of good quality and we love it
customer_reviews.author: nancy st laurent

customer_reviews.title: Not durable for outdoor user
customer_reviews.text: Table has warped considerably after a couple years. Despite description, this item is not suitable for outdoor use. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jim M

customer_reviews.title: Very nice patio table
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful wood finish. Helps if you have someone to aid in assembly. Not hard to do but table is heavy.Allen wrench supplied as are all screws.
customer_reviews.author: T. Gentry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far. Looks beautiful! Hoping it stands up well in my covered porch.
customer_reviews.author: lisa singerhouse

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good looking and functional. The frame is nice and sturdy although I wish the wood were tougher. (Don't let adults sit on the table.)
customer_reviews.author: SnowKnitty

customer_reviews.title: Great picnic table and benches!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect! We keep this under an outdoor roofed area so it receives minimal to no weathering. Sturdy and looks exactly as pictured; easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: derwin houser

customer_reviews.title: Love this table set.
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product and extremely easy to assemble, especially if you compare it to Ikea nightmares. It is a heavy, sturdy set and looks more expensive than it actually is.
customer_reviews.author: Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Never received the table, only the benches.
customer_reviews.text: Received the benches with a little printed note that said the other components may be arriving on different days, ten days later, still no table.
customer_reviews.author: Noah W Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: table missing
customer_reviews.text: I only received a box with the benches, I need the box of the table, you can tell me if it comes in another shipment because only a box arrived
customer_reviews.author: DAVID M.

customer_reviews.title: Farmhouse Table
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Table! Combines the casual feel of a picnic table with classic elegant farmhouse design. Excellent purchase-excellent seller! Thank you-m
customer_reviews.author: Mbussolotti

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is beautiful, and very sturdy. i bought the cover for it too.
customer_reviews.author: nelly nancy

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy and gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: The direction of how to put this together are incredibly clear. All the pieces are identified in separate packages
customer_reviews.author: Susan M. Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: Love the table
customer_reviews.text: Love the table, very easy to assemble and beautiful wood look/finish. The only complaint I have is that the benches dont tuck under the table easily, but that's my OCD issue, it is otherwise lovely!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to good to be true. However this is the real deal. Great outdoor table.
customer_reviews.author: David Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent aside from one side not fitting the screws. Love the design!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not actually black
customer_reviews.text: The "rustic black" metal is actually dark brown. The wood is really red/orange which does not look the same as the photo.
customer_reviews.author: James Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: So easy to assemble and it looks great.
customer_reviews.text: The legs of both benches and table are pre-attached on a hinge so the only thing you have to do for assembly is install the cross bar and lock the legs in place with the included hardware. Both the benches and table are built the same way. It's probably helpful to have two people to lift the table but the benches are easily assembled with one person.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Love this table
customer_reviews.text: Great buy, bought it for my new house and goes with the rustic look. Metal frame is very sturdy and the woodwork is beautiful. I would definitely recommend this if you like a rustic picnic table look.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey W.

customer_reviews.title: ... for my daughter and son in law and they love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my daughter and son in law and they love it!
customer_reviews.author: linda prince

customer_reviews.title: We bought this set and absolutely love it. Took only a few minutes to assemble
customer_reviews.text: We bought this set and absolutely love it. Took only a few minutes to assemble. Everyone that sees it falls in love with it. We use it indoors in our casual dining area with one of the benches most of the time and other chairs around three of the sides, unless we have friends over, then we use both benches. It's large without being to large. The multi colors in the wood and powder coated metal legs make it match other wood types throughout the house perfectly. Highly recommend this table set, indoors or out!
customer_reviews.author: Julie E

customer_reviews.title: Well made and sturdy. Seats plenty and the table is ample
customer_reviews.text: Well made and sturdy. Seats plenty and the table is ample. Easy to assemble. Love the color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this table set. Was easy to assemble, looks great on my patio and is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: angel9

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic set. Really gorgeous, sturdy (benches more so than the table) and easy to assemble. We love it
customer_reviews.author: D. Moawad

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this set on our new patio, if Amazon gets more in stock im considering purchasing a 2nd.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J. Fitzmaurice

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for screen porch - well made and easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: Met all of my expectations! Perfect for screen porch - well made and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Risa Clark

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. Came on time
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy. Came on time. Easy to asssemble. Included extras screws and parts which was helpful. Included easy to follow directions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was easy peasy to put together- it comes more or less ...
customer_reviews.text: I get compliments on this table all the time. It was easy peasy to put together- it comes more or less assembled. Its durable and looks good- a great value!
customer_reviews.author: Cee

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, well built picnic set
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged, easy ( for the most part) to assemble and looks great. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: linda palmer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged shipping
customer_reviews.text: Good table, sturdy and heavy... Was slightly damaged when received with shipping box also damaged. Too big to again break it down and return
customer_reviews.author: San

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This table was super easy to assemble. It's sturdy and super cute. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Table looks amazing and I wanted to give this five stars
customer_reviews.text: Table looks amazing and I wanted to give this five stars, but I can't. The holes didn't really line up well when I put it all together, and the top of the table arrived with a 2 foot long split/crack near the end. It was already assembled and cleaned up/packaging thrown away before I noticed so I don't know how I would return it. I will try to get in touch with the seller to send me another one but returning something this size seems like a huge pain! Edit: I am upping to 4 stars because the seller was easily contacted and a replacement has been scheduled. I will update to 5 when the replacement comes in working order!
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: It was super easy to put together and it shipped sooner than ...
customer_reviews.text: The table is gorgeous and huge. It was super easy to put together and it shipped sooner than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great Picnic Table
customer_reviews.text: This is a great picnic table. Easy to assemble and looks beautiful. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: William Corwin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in our backyard. The quality is nice, especially at this price. It was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Sloan

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: the holes don't line up properly and had to perform some reconstruction of it
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: we absolutely loved this picnic table with benches that we purchased for ...
customer_reviews.text: At first, we absolutely loved this picnic table with benches that we purchased for my Father to celebrate his 85th birthday. It was very easy to assemble and looked beautiful. My first complaint is actually my parents’ (the people that received the gift)...the benches are too wide to slide underneath the table. They wished that they would slide under, rather that stick out about six inches taking up deck and walking space. My main complaint (and I only wish I could somehow return it!), the wood on the top of the table has already split in two spots and the table isn’t even 1 month old! Very frustrating for spending $400.00 plus and this is already happening!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! Lots of compliments on the table
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Lots of compliments on the table. Wasn't too hard to put together. Got it at the end of the season, so I hope it will last the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Steven J. Prisco

customer_reviews.title: She said it was pretty easy and it looks beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a housewarming present for my daughter's new apartment. Her roommate put it together by herself! She said it was pretty easy and it looks beautiful!!! Besides the great price, the only thing left to say is thank you for an awesome product!!
customer_reviews.author: gena m medema

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful. Instructions for assembly a little tricky
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Instructions for assembly a little tricky, but it all came together and it is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

product_meta.title: Christopher Knight Home 298403 Bowman Wood Outdoor Picnic Table Set | Perfect for Dining, Brown + Black Rustic Metal
product_meta.description: Add a perfect focal point to your outdoor space with this casual Acacia wooden picnic table set. The Bowman table and benches are each complete with a folding steel frame that accentuates the sandblasted finish to offer a raw yet refined edge to any arrangement.
feature_bullets: Materials: acacia wood and iron | Color: rustic metal
Table Dimensions 71.00" L x 35.50" W x 29.25" H | Bench Dimensions 63.00" L x 14.50" W x 17.50" H

Add a perfect focal point to your outdoor space with this casual Acacia wooden picnic table set. The Bowman table and benches are each complete with a folding steel frame that accentuates the sandblasted finish to offer a raw yet refined edge to any arrangement

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars134 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
